4616.param: Your development advisor's – AKA my – solution for how to expand the port! You didn't forget about it, did you?

4618.param: I sent in an application and everything!

4619.param: I don't remember approving any application...

4620.param: Don't worry, you WILL once you read my proposal!

4622.param: Let's start from the top, shall we?

4623.param: Our first task will be to build some glorious statues of you.

4624.param: We'll place them by the port's main roads and next to buildings.

4625.param: It'll let people bask in your warm gaze every single day!

4626.param: And of course, we'll make the statues able to move!

4627.param: Then when holidays or notable events roll around...

4628.param: They'll clap their hands and say "happy holidays" and "congratulations" and so on.

4629.param: Pretty cool, huh? Gets me excited just picturing it!

4630.param: Come to think of it, you could do the same thing with a hologram. Plus it's more hi-tech and fancy...

4631.param: Hold on, let me just rewrite this part.

4634.param: After that, we'll get the port's radio station to use your voice for all its regular announcements!

4635.param: Then everyone will hear your soothing words at mealtimes!

4636.param: What's more, we'll install a live broadcasting microphone right in your office.

4637.param: That way, your voice will always be able to reach the whole port through the PA system!

4638.param: This should be the perfect pick-me-up for those of us who get a little down when you're not around!

4639.param: Not to mention, it makes relaying your orders completely effortless!

4640.param: If that's not two birds with one stone, I don't know what is!

4642.param: Now, this next part of my plan concerns the development of a theme park based on you...

4643.param: Aw shoot, I'm almost out of battery! Hang on, I'll come over and give you the rest in person!

4645.param: I just got my hands on something real neat!

option: Sounds like it could be fun.
There's no way that actually works.
4646.param: It's a thing that automatically grades advice for you!

4647.param: Sounds like it could be fun.

4648.param: There's no way that actually works.

4649.param: How does it work? Do I have to speak into it?

4650.param: No, you misunderstood me! It's not for you to use!

4651.param: It grades advice that is given TO you in particular!

4653.param: Anyway, I'm gonna test to see how accurate it is.

4654.param: Test 1: "The Commander should have a glass of my specialty drink every day."

4660.param: Test 2: "The Commander and I should do daily breathing exercises for stress relief."

4662.param: Test 3: "The Commander and I should share a soothing hug once a day"...

4664.param: Okay, last one... "Give the port 5-day weekends"!

option: Weird. I thought it was a good idea.

4669.param: If you got rid of our free time - or should I say, our strategic breaks...

4670.param: Then what fun will be left in our lives?!

4671.param: Forget it! This advice grader is completely kaput!

4673.param: Weird. I thought it was a good idea.

4674.param: What kind of advice grader gives a big fat 0 to something as great as that?

4675.param: It's gotta be faulty. I bet that green cat made it!

4676.param: It's your right as a consumer to get a refund!

4677.param: Yeah! I'm heading out right now!

4680.param: I've learned all the ins and outs of the psychology of love!

4681.param: Wanna put my knowledge to the test?

4684.param: With one of psychology's most classic methods, of course: sandplay therapy!

4685.param: Let's say you were just now transported into a locked room with absolutely nothing inside.

4686.param: What do you want to put there?

4687.param: A lamp or some kind of lighting, probably.

4688.param: Light is a symbol of hope and anticipation.

4689.param: Sounds like you're hoping that someone will extend their hand to you!

4690.param: A bed, desk, and some furniture wouldn't hurt.

4692.param: I'll bet you wish you could lie down and rest with somebody!

4693.param: Give me a working coastal battery first.

4694.param: A WHAT?! The first thing you want is a weapon?!

4695.param: Hmm... This could mean you have insufficient-firepower-phobia!

4696.param: Psychologically speaking, that's an expression of a desire to relieve stress.

4697.param: Okay, so you've placed your first object...

4698.param: What's the next thing you want?

4699.param: Since I don't know how long I'll be there, I'll need some food.

4700.param: Food is a representation of fulfillment and craving.

4701.param: I think that means you want to accomplish something with somebody!

4702.param: Some equipment with which to exchange information with the outside, I suppose. My work isn't gonna do itself.

4703.param: I'll refrain from commenting on how work is the first thing on your mind in there...

4704.param: More seriously, that comms equipment symbolizes knowledge and the spirit of enquiry.

4705.param: You're probably hoping to share your thoughts and feelings with somebody!

4706.param: You can't just lock me away in here. I'm bringing you in with me.

4707.param: Huh?! That's breaking the rules! Are you really gonna drag down the one who prepared the sandbox for you?

4708.param: I think the reason you're saying that is because you're harboring some anxieties!

4709.param: In essence, you're wishing for someone to be there for you.

4710.param: Alright, you've placed your two things.

4711.param: I can read the contents of your mind like an open book.

4712.param: In short, you want someone who'll always be there to support you!

4713.param: Lucky for you, it so happens I'm free right now!

4714.param: Sit tight and I'll be there in just a minute!
